name: finance-app
description: This is a budgeting app the uses Plaid

scripts.pre-commit: cd frontend && npm run pre-commit && cd ../backend && npm run pre-commit
scripts.install-dependencies: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.start:production: cd frontend && npm run start:production && cd ../backend && npm run start:production
